Chehab Lab

Advancing the frontiers of AI, Cyber Security, and Healthcare at AUB.

About the Lab

Chehab Lab is a premier research group located at the American University of Beirut (AUB).
Led by Dr. Ali Chehab, our lab focuses on solving complex problems at the intersection of technological innovation and societal impact.

Artificial Intelligence

Engineering robust, ethical, and efficient AI systems for real-world impact while advancing the fundamental core of machine intelligence research.

Cyber Security

Fortifying the digital infrastructures of the future through state-of-the-art threat detection and revolutionary privacy-preserving technologies.

Healthcare

Transcending the limits of modern medicine by integrating intelligent systems to enhance patient outcomes, data security, and diagnostic precision.
